name: df-com2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccm2, copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
comment: A device to add commutativity to various sorts of rings. I use ` ran g ` because I suppose ` g ` has a neutral element and therefore is onto. (Contributed by FL, 6-Sep-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
